评论详情: Perfect fit for my pilates class outfit.
I ordered a large.. it fit more like a small.. and it’s was short.. very tight across the upper back…

评论概述: Love the fabric, but not the fit
评论详情: The fabric on this is really soft, but the fit is snug. The length was longer than I anticipated as well.
I love the material and the length on this top but they runs small.  I ordered and medium which is my usual size on amazon and it was too tight.
I like this top. However, it is a little see through.

This is a cute workout top. It’s similar to others I have had. I like it and it fits true to size. I wear a size 8 and the medium is perfect on me. Not too tight and a good length. It washed well too. The quality is decent and I would feel good paying $12-$15 for it.

评论概述: Super soft pleated back workout shirt
评论详情: I love the modal fabric of this shirt, it’s so soft and luxuriously comfortable. The design is great, but as for being “long”, it’s really not all that long in the torso. I’m 5’7”, so I’m not much taller than average, and the front hemline is a couple inches shorter than my everyday t-shirts. While the back hemline is longer than the front, it just barely covers my “backside”. So I don’t agree with the “long” description, but I do love everything else about this top. The material is lovely, the olive green color is nice, and it’s lightweight yet not see through. Maybe for shorter people, this could be considered “long”, in the back, but for average to taller people, it’s a normal length shirt.
Love this shirt, true to size, fits well, soft fabric, and look flattering

This long workout top with a short-sleeve pleated back has become my go-to for yoga sessions. At $17.99, it's a steal considering its quality and versatility. The loose fit is flattering, and the fabric feels soft against the skin, making it ideal for days when I want to work out without revealing too much. It moves seamlessly with my body during yoga flows, providing both comfort and style. Overall, it's a great investment for anyone seeking a modest yet functional yoga top.
Need to return.  Usually wear a medium but this is tight and shorter than expected

评论概述: Super nice! Runs a little small
评论详情: I really thought this was going to be see-through when I pulled it out. It's crazy lightweight and soft, but the material is really thin and I thought that would be an issue with the white shirt. I was wrong! It is a fabric that shows the outline of the sports bra I wear underneath, but just the shape of it, not any colors. I wore it with a bright orange bra, and I couldn't see any orange through it at all!  It shows sweat a LITTLE bit, but not bad. It's very, very comfortable. My only real "gripe" is the sizing. I got a medium, but I really wish I had sized up. It's pretty tight around my hips and likes to ride up a bit because of it. It's also a little tight on the arms. Besides that, I love this shirt!

I love the material this is made from! It's cool and soft and comfortable to wear. A little thin but for the comfort it doesn't bother me. Runs perfectly true to size so easy to pick the right one. I might need to get a few more in different colors.

The fabric for this top is very flowy, and not only works great as a yoga/work out top, but it is also very attractive and will work with jeans or a skirt.  It is true to size, fits very comfortably, and breathes well.  The fabric has a soft feel to it, and it moisture wicks great.  I am happy with it, and I recommend it.

评论概述: This is a nice, lightweight athletic type of material.
评论详情: I have a longer torso so my bum wasn't quite covered, but the drape was super flattering and hid my middle age tummy but still followed the curves that should be followed.  Snug in the sleeves because my arms have actual muscle, but it looks good.  Like another recent vine item, I just bought another one.  Definitely recommended!

This workout top is great for the gym.  It is so lightweight and easy to move in.  After working up a sweat, once done with my workout the top dried in minutes.  I even have a cooling cloth I wear around my neck and the water from the cooling cloth didn't make the front of the top wet like other tops I've worn, so that was an added plus.  This is going to become a regular top to wear to the gym or even if outside on hot days to help keep me cool.  The sizing was perfect, not tight or loose.
